com.github.gwtd3.api.core
Class Transform

java.lang.Object
  com.google.gwt.core.client.JavaScriptObject
      com.github.gwtd3.api.core.Transform

public class Transform
extends com.google.gwt.core.client.JavaScriptObject

A Transform is a representation of a SVG transform attribute.

It allows parsing the svg transform attribute with parse(String), manipulation using setters, such as rotate(double), then generation of the transform attribute with JavaScriptObject.toString()

Author:
Anthony Schiochet

Constructor Detail

Transform

protected Transform()
Method Detail

parse

public static final Transform parse(String transformString)
Parses the given 2D affine transform string, as defined by SVG's transform attribute.

The transform is then decomposed to a standard representation of translate, rotate, x-skew and scale.

This behavior is standardized by CSS: see matrix decomposition for animation.

Parameters:
transformString - the transform string as in SVG
Returns:
the Transform object
